revised_title: Inheritance of Coat-Color and Eye-Color: A Study in Correlation and Heredity
tldr: This article explores the inheritance of coat color in horses and eye color in humans, using statistical methods to analyze the correlation and intensity of heredity. The author finds that these traits do not follow the law of ancestral heredity and suggests that exclusive inheritance without reversion may be a more accurate description of these phenomena. The study also highlights the importance of further research on the intensity and form of inheritance for various characters in different species.
